NAME: TAIEX Expert Mission on the Review of the Draft Law on Air Protection from Pollution
AREALEGISLATION: 27 Environment [15] (Partial),27.05 Forests and forestry [03.30.60] (Complete),27.10 Environment [15.10] (Partial),27.10.10 General provisions and programmes [15.10.10] (Complete),27.10.20 Pollution and nuisances [15.10.20] (Partial),27.10.20.20 Water protection and management [15.10.20.20] (Complete),27.10.20.30 Monitoring of atmospheric pollution [15.10.20.30] (Complete),27.10.20.40 Prevention of noise pollution [15.10.20.40] (Complete),27.10.20.50 Chemicals, industrial risk and biotechnology [15.10.20.50] (Complete),27.10.30 Space, environment and natural resources [15.10.30] (Partial),27.10.30.10 Management and efficient use of space, the environment and natural resources [15.10.30.10] (Complete),27.10.30.20 Conservation of wild fauna and flora [15.10.30.20] (Complete),27.10.30.30 Waste management and clean technology [15.10.30.30] (Complete),27.10.40 International cooperation [15.10.40] (Complete)
AIMASSISTANCE: The aim is to provide assistance in the revision of the Draft Law on Air Protection from Pollution in compliance  with the relevant EU legislation in this field.
LEGISLATIONADMIN:
1.Directive 2008/50/EC OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 21 May on ambient air quality and cleaner air for Europe.  
2. Directive  2004/107/EC relating to arsenic, cadmium, mercury, nickel and polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons in ambient air 
3. Directive  2001/81/EC on national emission ceilings for certain atmospheric pollutants. 
4. Directive 2003/87/EC -  establishing a scheme for greenhouse gas emission allowance trading within the Community and amending Council Directive 96/61/EC. 
5.Directive 2004/101/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 October 2004 amending Directive 2003/87/EC establishing a scheme for greenhouse gas emission allowance trading within the Community, in respect of the Kyoto Protocol's project . 
6. Directive 2008/101/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 19 November 2008 amending Directive 2003/87/EC so as to include aviation activities in the scheme for greenhouse gas emission allowance trading within the Community. 
7. Directive  2009/29/EC, amending Directive 2003/87/EC so as to improve and extend the greenhouse gas emission allowance trading scheme of the Community. 
8. Directive  2009/30/EC OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 23  April 2009 amending Directive 98/70/EC as regards the specification of petrol, diesel and gas-oil and introducing a mechanism to monitor and reduce greenhouse gas emissions and amending Council Directive 1999/32/EC as regards the specification of fuel used by inland waterway vessels and repealing Directive 93/12/EEC. 
9. Decision No  406/2009/EC OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 23  April 2009 on the effort of Member States to reduce their greenhouse gas emissions to meet the Community’s greenhouse gas emission reduction commitments up to  2020. 
10. Regulation (EC) No  1005/2009 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 16  September 2009 on substances that deplete the ozone layer. 
11.Regualtion (EC) No 842/2006 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 17 May 2006 on certain fluorinated greenhouse gases. 
12. 97/101/EC: Council Decision of 27 January 1997 establishing a reciprocal exchange of information and data from networks and individual stations measuring ambient air pollution within the Member States.  
13. Commission Decision 2001/752/EC of 17 October 2001 amending the Annexes to Council Decision 97/101/EC establishing a reciprocal exchange of information and data from networks and individual stations measuring ambient air pollution within the Member States . 
14.  2004/224/EC Commission Decision of 20 February 2004 laying down arrangements for the submission of information on plans or programmes required under Council Directive 96/62/EC in relation to limit values for certain pollutants in ambient air. 
15. 2004/461/EC Commission Decision of 29 April 2004 laying down a questionnaire to be used for annual reporting on ambient air quality assessment under Council Directives 96/62/EC and 1999/30/EC and under Directives 2000/69/EC and 2002/3/EC.  
16.Commission Regualtion (EU) No 1031/2010 of 12  November 2010 on the timing, administration and other aspects of auctioning of greenhouse gas emission allowances pursuant to Directive 2003/87/EC.
BENEFICIARYINSTITUTION: Ministry of Environment and Spatial Planning
TARGETAUDIENCE: Official from Ministry of Environment and Spatial Planning
